sentences.sContent: His boss discharged him for habitual absenteeism.
sentences.sContent_eng: His boss discharged him for habitual absenteeism.
sentences.sCn: 他的老板因他习惯性旷工而解雇了他。

sentences.sContent: School refusal — any kind of absenteeism, from phobia to truancy, that can be traced to the child’s own actions and wishes — is at the very intersection of education, psychology and pediatrics.
sentences.sContent_eng: School refusal — any kind of absenteeism, from phobia to truancy, that can be traced to the child’s own actions and wishes — is at the very intersection of education, psychology and pediatrics.
sentences.sCn: 拒学症---任何一种旷课，从恐惧到逃学，都能从孩子自身的品行和愿望上找到根源---而且是教育，心理学和儿科学等因素交织在一起。

synos.tran: [劳经]旷工；旷课；有计划的怠工；经常无故缺席

words.tran: 缺席的；缺少的；心不在焉的；茫然的

trans.tranOther: Absenteeism is the fact or habit of frequently being away from work or school, usually without a good reason
